headline: Algonquin Power & Utilities (AQN) Tops Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Algonquin Power & Utilities (AQN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 55.56% and 4.02%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From NRG Energy Stock Ahead Of Q1 Earnings
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) will release earnings results for the first quarter, before the opening bell on Monday, May 12. Analysts expect the Houston-based company to report quarterly earnings at $1.67 per share, up from 90 cents per share in the year-ago period. And, on May 5, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith maintained NRG Energy with a Buy rating and raised the price target from $113 to $132.
